scenes.description: Wrapping up the 'cork' charade and preparing for the next round.
Jellyfish charade: Ame mimics a jellyfish using her cape and tassels.
Janitor charade: Ame mimics sweeping the floor.
Box charade: Ame mimics being inside a box.
Pogo stick charade: Ame mimics hopping on a pogo stick.
Takanashi Kiara charade: Ame mimics Kiara's signature pose.
Reward section: Ame offers custom poses as prizes, and Sana requests jumping jacks.
